answers.answer: Yup - I'm the only one in my family.
I am the only one I have ever heard of in my family tree.Alex
I'm the first in my family and I hope the last.
I am the third out of four sisters with it. But we are the rare case. I was told 80% of people with the disease have no siblings with it or anyone in the immeadiate family.Emily
No history of any MS in my family.Some other autoimmune diseeases though: ITP, diabetes.  It's unclear what if any the connection may be re: genetic predisposition for autoimmune disease.

question: is it possible to have ms without there not being any of it in your family
title: ms in family
